Namespace StardewModdingAPI.Events

Classes

ContentEvents

Events raised when the game loads content.

ControlEvents

Events raised when the player uses a controller, keyboard, or mouse.

EventArgsClickableMenuChanged

Event arguments for a MenuChanged event.

EventArgsClickableMenuClosed

Event arguments for a MenuClosed event.

EventArgsControllerButtonPressed

Event arguments for a ControllerButtonPressed event.

EventArgsControllerButtonReleased

Event arguments for a ControllerButtonReleased event.

EventArgsControllerTriggerPressed

Event arguments for a ControllerTriggerPressed event.

EventArgsControllerTriggerReleased

Event arguments for a ControllerTriggerReleased event.

EventArgsInput

Event arguments when a button is pressed or released.

EventArgsIntChanged

Event arguments for an integer field that changed value.

EventArgsInventoryChanged

Event arguments for a InventoryChanged event.

EventArgsKeyboardStateChanged

Event arguments for a KeyboardChanged event.

EventArgsKeyPressed

Event arguments for a KeyboardChanged event.

EventArgsLevelUp

Event arguments for a LeveledUp event.

EventArgsLocationBuildingsChanged

Event arguments for a BuildingsChanged event.

EventArgsLocationObjectsChanged

Event arguments for a ObjectsChanged event.

EventArgsLocationsChanged

Event arguments for a LocationsChanged event.

EventArgsMineLevelChanged

Event arguments for a MineLevelChanged event.

EventArgsMouseStateChanged

Event arguments for a MouseChanged event.

EventArgsPlayerWarped

Event arguments for a Warped event.

EventArgsValueChanged<T>

Event arguments for a field that changed value.

GameEvents

Events raised when the game changes state.

GraphicsEvents

Events raised during the game's draw loop, when the game is rendering content to the window.

InputEvents

Events raised when the player uses a controller, keyboard, or mouse button.

ItemStackChange

Represents an inventory slot that changed.

LocationEvents

Events raised when the player transitions between game locations, a location is added or removed, or the objects in the current location change.

MenuEvents

Events raised when a game menu is opened or closed (including internal menus like the title screen).

MineEvents

Events raised when something happens in the mines.

MultiplayerEvents

Events raised during the multiplayer sync process.

PlayerEvents

Events raised when the player data changes.

SaveEvents

Events raised before and after the player saves/loads the game.

SpecialisedEvents

Events serving specialised edge cases that shouldn't be used by most mod.

TimeEvents

Events raised when the in-game date or time changes.

Enums

ChangeType

Indicates how an inventory item changed.

EventArgsLevelUp.LevelType

The player skill types.
